title: 【100的地图搬运】Brickston Manor Map
author: 壹佰佰佰
txt_content:
Brickston Manor Map                                                                           Brickston庄园
——

介绍（中文翻译）：Brickston庄园是一个安全逃生过程中围攻，或相关的具体情况作出一个孤立的政府房地产。
该庄园是inaccesable没有Airboats旅游，船，或airballoons因为位置不能前往由车或一般的人。这些物资是稀缺的，并且依赖于货运船来通过囤积的能量来源，权力的引擎，以及楼宇，提供一个舒适的环境，那些住在庄园。该钟塔需要运行的资源最多。然而，由于看似低效的钟塔，似乎，它提供一个重要的目的明确告诉时间表示出发和资源的到达时间。
——
介绍（英文原版）：Brickston Manor is an isolated government estate specifically made for a safety escape during sieges, or related situations.
The Manor is inaccesable without airboats, boats, or airballoons and cannot be traveled to by carts or average human because of the location. The supplies are scarce and relies on cargo boats to come by to stock up the energy source which powers the engines, and buildings, providing a comfortable environment to those that lives in the Manor. The clocktower takes the most resources to run. However, as seemingly inefficient the clocktower seems, it serves a important purpose to specifically tell the time which indicates the time of departure and arrival of resources.
——
